name: DriveTime - Advice Center
description: A website intended for DriveTime customers which provide advices and tips about business and finances. This is built using the Bones theme with a custom permalink rewrite rules. A non-responsive site.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, SASS, jQuery, MySQL

name: Digma
description: A collection of articles and events about Arts and Artitechture. Schools and organizations can submit their events using a custom form and there's also a donation page which is integrated using PayPal API. I worked mostly on the client side, while my partner on the server side.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, MySQL

name: DriveTime - Complaint Center
description: A complaint center which allows DriveTime customers to submit their concerns and complaints. Also have a couple of FAQ articles. This is the 2nd time to use Bones and SASS. A responsive website.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, SASS, jQuery, MySQL

name: Paragon Life Homes
description: This is a company website which sepcializes on corporate homebuilding. This also displays available and in-development community homes mostly on Las Vegas, Nevada area. Built mostly using a Page Builder plugin with ofcourse, a custom-styled templates.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL

name: Global Leadership Institute
description: As the website says, this is a "Non-Profit, Non-Governmental Organization. Serves as an International Leadership Research & Development Organization, creating programmes & strategies...". The homepage event and details can be dynamically set from the WP dashboard.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, MySQL

name: DriveTime Dealership
description: A single delearship website from DriveTime specifically for Mesa, Arizona branch. This shows list of cars and details based on the Make and Model, which is fetched from DriveTime's internal API. First project to use Bones theme and SASS.
technology: WordPress - PHP, HTML5, SASS, jQuery, MySQL
